code: import{INCREAMENT,DECREAMENT}from'../action_types';var initState=0;export default function countReducer(){var preState=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,data=action.data;switch(type){case INCREAMENT:return preState+data;case DECREAMENT:return preState-data;default:return preState;}}
